title: Contact Us - SalaryWise.io
description: Get in touch with our team
keywords: contact, support, feedback, salary calculator help

intro.paragraph1: Have questions about our salary calculators? Need help with a specific calculation? Want to suggest a new feature? We'd love to hear from you!
intro.paragraph2: While we don't offer direct customer support, you can reach out through the channels below for general inquiries and feedback.

contactMethods.availability: Check our repository for known issues

faqPreview.question: Are the calculations accurate?
faqPreview.answer: Yes, we use official tax rates and formulas. However, tax laws change frequently, so always consult a professional for important financial decisions.

faqPreview.question: Can I use this for tax filing?
faqPreview.answer: Our calculators provide estimates only. For official tax calculations, please consult a qualified tax professional or use official government tools.

faqPreview.question: Do you store my data?
faqPreview.answer: No, all calculations are performed in your browser. We don't store any personal or financial information.

disclaimer: Please note that SalaryWise.io provides general information and estimation tools only. Our calculators are not a substitute for professional financial or tax advice. Always consult with qualified professionals for important financial decisions.
